# Definition of Done

- [ ] Working according to the Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit/Integration Tests coverage >85%
- [ ] Monitoring & Observability metrics are measured
- [ ] CI/CD passed
- [ ] Deployed on PROD
- [ ] Manual tests performed
- [ ] Doc updated
